title: We Heard You. We're Going Back to Disqus.
text:
After rolling out the new commenting system for Townhall recently, and after receiving all of your much-needed, honest feedback on the Spot.IM commenting system, Townhall is making the change you want. The Townhall Media family is going back to Disqus, which was requested by many of our readers.

Once again, you will be able to block trolls and have all the commenting features that you want.

We've heard your complaints, and we're going back to Disqus. Right now.

Thank you for being loyal readers of Townhall, we love you all.
